channel.title: Adding ANY Npc in ruse source
channel.description:
Hey guys, I need a little help with adding any NPC in ruse source, adding a NPC which is tradeable, like making a donator shop etc Ruse source is using .json files, so there is no ActionHandler.java, spawn-config etc... If anyone know how to add NPC which one is tradeable please let me know
You can simply add me in skype aswell, SKYPE : pepunussonmoes
Thanks.
I tried to add, I got NPC spawned, but when I try to trade it DC's me, aswell when I spawn NPC, and try to trade any other completed NPC's, it DCs me..

item.title: Adding ANY Npc in ruse source
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

I fixed it for him. He forgot a comma right before adding a new json block.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding ANY Npc in ruse source

item.title: Adding ANY Npc in ruse source
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

rune-server.ee

Adding ANY Npc in ruse source

Rune-Server

So you have a post on rune server asking the same thing - but you left out 90% of the information that’s posted on there.

And on there, they said you had an extra comma. Did you fix what they suggested or no?

Read full topic
